gameplay.map
Class GraphMap

java.lang.Object
  gameplay.map.GraphMap

public class GraphMap
extends java.lang.Object

Overview

The GraphMap class instantiate a simple undirected graph which contains all the cells reachable by a dinosaur.
It uses JGraphT library, the resulting graph is a SimpleGraph and the shortest path between two cells is calculated using DijkstraShortestPath methods. This class includes:

  • graph The graph containing the cells in the square surrounding a dinosaur

Version:
1.0
Author:
AxxO

calculateShortestPath

public java.util.List<org.jgrapht.graph.DefaultEdge> calculateShortestPath(Cell startCell,
                                                                           Cell endCell)
The method calculateShortestPath returns the shortest path between two cells. This implementation uses Dijsktra's algorithm in order to calculate the result.

Parameters:
startCell -
endCell -
Returns:
the list of edges composing the shortest path from startCell to endCell
